thread.section_title: Pond5 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pond5 | www.pond5.com
thread.title: Garey Cooper

author: Garey Cooper
title: Garey Cooper
text:
This site is very handy to an amateur VLOGGER as a source for those professional looking intro's and outro's that can make a video look very good. The site is well organized and easy to use. There are many subject areas and I have always found something that would be useful.
I use iMovie and these integrate well into that software.
I do wish they weren't quite so expensive so you have to be a little picky in that regard when selecting the right clip.
A good experience all round with the site and product.
